page.title: 13HOUSING:BADINGHAM/DENNINGTON
page.content: Of 118 households, 83 own their homes. 3 have their main residence elsewhere. 44 have made major alterations to their homes. Badingham has 8 council houses; Dennington has 16 (and a further 16 outside the block). It is not known how many have been bought by their occupants. 17 houses are frequently if not regularly let to USAF personnel. A new detached 3-bedroom house recently sold for Â£49,500. The East Anglian Academy of Transcendental Meditation occupies the Old Rectory, Badingham. 17 houses are listed as of special architectural or historic interest Grade II. Approximate age of houses: one to 9 years - 10; 10 to 49 - 35; 50 to 99 - ll; 100 to 199 - 21; 200 to 299 - 13; 300 to 399 - 8; over 400 - 10; no information - 10.
